sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Important Notice to Long-Term Shareholders of Holley Inc.
feed.summary: Grabar Law Office is notifying long-term shareholders of Holley Inc. (NYSE: HLLY) about a securities fraud class action complaint that has survived a motion to dismiss. The complaint alleges that Holley made false and misleading statements regarding its business practices, including its troubled relationships with resellers and distributors and unintegrated acquisitions. Shareholders who held shares on or after July 21, 2021, are encouraged to seek corporate reforms and the return of funds to the company.

feed.title: Important Notice to Long-Term Shareholders of Holley Inc. (NYSE: HLLY) F/K/A Empower Ltd.: Grabar Law Office Investigates Claims on Your Behalf After Securities Fraud Class Action Complaint Survives Motion to Dismiss
feed.summary: Grabar Law Office is investigating claims on behalf of long-term shareholders of Holley Inc. (NYSE: HLLY) following a securities fraud class action complaint surviving a motion to dismiss. The complaint alleges that Holley, formerly Empower Ltd., made false and misleading statements regarding its business practices, particularly concerning its direct-to-consumer channel, reseller relationships, and the sustainability of its growth. Shareholders are encouraged to contact the firm to learn more about seeking corporate reforms and the return of funds to the company.

feed.title: Grabar Law Office Investigates Claims on Behalf of Long-Term Shareholders of Holley Inc. (HLLY) f/k/a Empower Ltd. After Securities Fraud Class Action Survives Motion to Dismiss
feed.summary: Grabar Law Office is investigating claims on behalf of long-term shareholders of Holley Inc. (HLLY) f/k/a Empower Ltd., following the survival of a securities fraud class action lawsuit against the company. The lawsuit alleges that Holley made false or misleading statements regarding its business practices, including damage to reseller relationships, ineffective growth strategies through its DTC channel, and failure to integrate acquisitions. Shareholders who held shares since July 21, 2021, can seek corporate reforms and a return of funds.

feed.title: Holley Performance Brands Grows Global Footprint with Mexico Expansion
feed.summary: Holley Performance Brands is expanding its operations into Mexico, bringing its portfolio of automotive aftermarket performance solutions to the thriving enthusiast market. The expansion begins with its Modern Truck & Off-Road consumer vertical, with plans to introduce Domestic Muscle and Safety & Racing brands later in the year. This strategic move aims to strengthen Holley's international presence and make its leading solutions more accessible to Mexican enthusiasts.

feed.title: Holley Performance announces pricing of secondary stock offering at $2.75
feed.summary: Holley Performance Products, Inc. announced the pricing of an underwritten secondary public offering of 7,000,000 shares of its common stock at $2.75 per share, offered by an affiliate of Sentinel Capital Partners. The offering is expected to close around October 10, 2023, subject to customary conditions. Holley will not receive any proceeds from the sale of these shares by the selling stockholder.

feed.title: Holley Performance Brands Announces Third Quarter 2025 Financial Results Release Date and Conference Call Details
feed.summary: Holley Performance Brands will announce its third quarter 2025 financial results on November 7, 2025. A conference call and live webcast will be held at 8:30 AM Eastern Time on the same day, hosted by President and CEO Matthew Stevenson and CFO Jesse Weaver. The earnings release and presentation will be available on the company's Investor Relations website before the market opens.

feed.title: Lenny Lottig clinches Holley EFI Factory X world championship - NHRA
feed.summary: Lenny Lottig has clinched the Holley EFI Factory X world championship in the first round of the Texas NHRA FallNationals. Driving his Bill Jenkins Grumpy’s Toy Tribute Camaro, Lottig secured his first title after his closest competitor, Jesse Alexandra, was eliminated. Lottig's successful season included three wins in Charlotte, Richmond, and Reading, and runner-up finishes in Norwalk and Indy, showcasing a dominant performance in the class.

feed.title: What Makes Holley Inc. (HLLY) a Strong Momentum Stock: Buy Now?
feed.summary: This article analyzes why Holley Inc. (HLLY) is considered a strong momentum stock, highlighting its Zacks Momentum Style Score of B and Zacks Rank of #2 (Buy). It details the company's recent price performance, outperforming both its industry and the S&P 500, and positive earnings estimate revisions. The piece concludes that HLLY is a promising near-term pick for investors seeking momentum.

feed.title: Holley Performance Brands to Expand Ford Fest with New Truck and Off-Road Experiences
feed.summary: Holley Performance Brands is expanding its annual Ford Fest to include new truck and off-road experiences, moving beyond its Mustang-centric origins. The 7th annual event, taking place from September 26-27, 2025, at Beech Bend Raceway in Bowling Green, Kentucky, will feature Bronco activities, "Truck Warz" drag racing, off-road skill training, and displays of performance products. Holley is now the sole organizer of the event, which is expected to draw 20,000 attendees and 2,000 vehicles.

feed.title: HOLLEY SHAREHOLDER ALERT: Kaskela Law LLC Announces
feed.summary: Kaskela Law LLC has announced an investigation into Holley Inc. (NYSE: HLLY) on behalf of its long-term shareholders following a securities fraud complaint. The complaint alleges that Holley made false and misleading statements to investors between July 2021 and February 2023, leading to a significant decline in its stock price. Shareholders who purchased shares before May 12, 2022, are encouraged to contact the firm for more information regarding their legal rights.

feed.title: HOLLEY SHAREHOLDER ALERT: Kaskela Law LLC Announces Investigation of Holley Inc. and Encourages Long-Term Investors to Contact the Firm – HLLY
feed.summary: Kaskela Law LLC has announced an investigation into Holley Inc. (NYSE: HLLY) on behalf of long-term shareholders following a securities fraud complaint. The complaint alleges that Holley made materially false and/or misleading statements regarding its business and operations between July 2021 and February 2023, specifically concerning reseller promotions and minimum advertised pricing. The investigation aims to determine if Holley's board of directors violated securities laws or breached fiduciary duties, and shareholders who purchased shares prior to May 12, 2022 are encouraged to contact the firm.

feed.title: Court Rejects Holley’s Attempt to Amend Order Forcing It to Disgorge $2 Million in Ill-Gotten Profits to Specialty Auto Parts U.S.A.
feed.summary: The United States District Court for the Western District of Kentucky rejected Holley Performance Products, Inc.'s motion to amend an order requiring it to disgorge over $2 million in profits to Specialty Auto Parts U.S.A., Inc. This disgorgement stems from Holley's violation of a 2001 Settlement Agreement. The Court further ordered Holley to post a supersedeas bond reflecting the original judgment and accrued post-judgment interest.

feed.title: Holley Performance Brands Launches Modern Truck & Off-Road Performance Packages
feed.summary: Holley Performance Brands (NYSE: HLLY) has introduced Modern Truck & Off-Road Performance Packages, offering a comprehensive solution for aftermarket customization in the truck and off-road sectors. These curated packages integrate top products from brands like Flowmaster, ADS, and Baer, making it easier for enthusiasts to upgrade popular vehicle platforms. The initiative aims to simplify the modification process by bundling compatible components like exhaust systems, brakes, suspension kits, and electronic tuners.

feed.title: HOLLEY ALERT: Bragar Eagel & Squire, P.C. Reminds Investors
feed.summary: Bragar Eagel & Squire, P.C. is reminding investors that a class action lawsuit has been filed against Holley Inc. (NYSE: HLLY) for alleged false and misleading statements during the period of July 21, 2021, to February 6, 2023. The lawsuit claims Holley's focus on direct-to-consumer sales damaged reseller relationships, led to operational inefficiencies, and that the company misled investors about sustainable growth after a COVID-related boost. Investors who purchased Holley shares during the specified "Class Period" have until January 5, 2024, to apply to be appointed as lead plaintiff.

feed.title: Holley Allegedly Misled About Consumer Demand Before Stock Drops
feed.summary: Holley Inc., an automotive parts company, and two former executives are facing a shareholder class action lawsuit. They are accused of misleading investors about the company's growth and consumer demand between 2021 and 2023, following its merger and renaming from Empower Ltd. The complaint alleges that the company falsely claimed preparedness for an economic downturn due to strong demand and organic sales growth.

feed.title: NHRA set to debut Factory X presented by Holley Exhibition Class During 2022 Season
feed.summary: The NHRA announced a new Factory X (FX) exhibition racing class for the 2022 season, presented by Holley. This class will bridge the gap between Factory Stock Showdown and Pro Stock, featuring newer manufactured automobiles with a minimum weight of 2,650 pounds and mandatory manual transmissions. The FX class will debut at select NHRA Camping World Drag Racing Series events as an exhibition category in mid-2022, with plans for it to become a heads-up category in 2023.

feed.title: Insane Automotive Action at Holley LS Fest East 2021!
feed.summary: The Holley LS Fest East 2021 in Bowling Green, Kentucky, celebrated everything LS-engine-powered, including LT-powered rides, drawing over 45,000 attendees. The event featured a variety of activities like autocross, drag racing, drifting, burnout contests, and a massive car show showcasing numerous LS-swapped vehicles. Despite its narrow focus, its continued growth and diverse activities make it a highly anticipated annual event for automotive enthusiasts.
